explains: adj. 昂贵的，值钱的；造成严重损失的，代价大的

sentences.en: You want to avoid costly legal proceedings if you can.
sentences.cn: 如果能够的话你希望避免昂贵的法律诉讼。

sentences.en: The best equipment is costly but is well worth the outlay.
sentences.cn: 最好的设备花费大，但这种开支很值得。

sentences.en: Buying new furniture may prove too costly.
sentences.cn: 购买新家具可能会花钱太多。
